title: Hour 2: Tony Buzbee joins the show
description:
Tony Buzbee, the attorney representing the women who sued Deshaun Watson, joins the show to discuss the suspension decision. Plus, Harry Douglas, Damien Woody, and Domonique Foxworth join the show to debate who has a better shot at a Super Bowl, Tom Brady or Aaron Rodgers. The crew also debates if the Cowboys can still count on Zeke Elliot, and which 2nd year QB will make the biggest jump.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
